projects.title: Physio Global Webinar Meaningful use of activitytrackers within Physiotherapy.
projects.description: A Webinar about activitytrackers with senior researcher and lecturer Dr. Darcy Ummels Hogeschool Zuyd and Maastricht University. What do we know about the scientific evidence about the use of activity trackers? And.. how can we implement this within physiotherapy. In collaboration with Zuyd Hogeschool and Maastricht University. This Webinar was accredited for the Netherlands and Belgium.

projects.title: Physio Global Webinar Obese
projects.description: A Webinar about obese with Physician Assistant Franciscus Gasthuis and PhD student Erasmus MC Willy Theel MSc. and dietician Debora Mol BSc. Presentator Adriaan Ruesink BoH. talked with them about obese, the mechanism, complexity of it, how reasearch is going on scientific in general and as well on a patient level. And.. about therapeutic interventions and collaboration within the Dutch and Belgian Healthcare. This Webinar was accredited for the Netherlands and Belgium.

projects.title: Online Symposium Dutch Association for physiotherapy within Lymphology and Oncology
projects.description: We did a livestream of the online Symposium 'Cancer Survivorship Care' of the Online Congress Dutch Association for physiotherapy within Lymphology and Oncology. Almost 500 physiotherapists watched this online symposium. With multiple online speakers in combination of interaction of participants and the general board of the Association, this symposium has been a success.

projects.description: A Physio Global episode in collaboration with Erasmus MC. projects.title: Physio Global Webinar Science and Education in clinical Practice with Prof. Dr. Ostelo, Prof. Dr. Veenhof and van Doormaal MSc
projects.description: During this episode, livestreamed at the Vrije universiteit van Amsterdam, we discussed about Science and Education integrating into clinical practice. The essence of integrating it, the level of complexity it has to do this in clinical practice and the importance of guideline developing are widely discussed.

projects.title: Physio Global Vodcast To or not to be patient-centered with Sanneke Don Phd and Amarins Wijma Phd
projects.description: In this podcast episode we talked about to be or not to be patient-centered. During this episode we have Amarins Wijma Phd and Sanneke Phd both Pain in Motion member, promoted at the university of Brussels and working as physiotherapists as our guests. We filmed this episode at the Fysio de Tille in the Netherlands. With more than 600 viewers it has been a great success.

projects.title: NVMT Webinar Physiotherapic workflows and setting up partnerships for treating patients with pain.
projects.description: A Webinar for the Dutch Association for Manual Treating about Physiotherapic workflows and setting up partnerships for treating patients with pain. Doing the presentation by myself interviewing lecturer and scientist Hanze and VU Roland Reezigt and anesthesiologist UMC Utrecht dr Bart van Wijck. Tom Wijnands and Martine Verwoerd did their job for organising this event as well as moderating.

projects.title: Physio Global Vodcast Together United for treating shoulder problems.
projects.description: In this podcast episode we talked about uniting together for treating patients with shoulder problems. During this episode we have orthopedic surgeon Dutch Olympic Team Marc Wagener and physiotherapist Dutch Olympic Team and lecturer HAN Beate Dejaco ad our guests. We filmed this episode at the complex Papendal. With more than 400 listeners and 1.000 viewers it has been a great success.

Senior musculoskeletaal fysiotherapeut Sport Medisch Centrum Papendal

projects.title: Physio Global Podcast DRONE: unite forces for researching osteoarthritis with scientists Corelien Kloek and Jesper Knoop
projects.description: In this podcast episode we talked about research of osteoarthritis, the clinical relevance for it in clinical practice and DRONE. A new consortium of particularly 13 members from different Dutch universities and research institutes. The reason of founding DRONE, the main goal of this consortium and what needs to be done getting health care, physiotherapy and patient care to an next level at treating osteoarthritis.

contributors.headline: Owner Physio Global I Board Member Dutch Association for Manual Therapy I PT I Manual Therapist I ESS I Member Council VvAA
Senior researcher/lecturer @HAN/VU/AmsterdamUMC & member of DRONE consortium
Senior-Onderzoeker Lectoraat Innovatie van Beweegzorg Hogeschool Utrecht

projects.title: Physio Global Podcast Physical Self-Reliance for everyone? With scientist Esther Molenaar
projects.description: During this 4th podcast we interviewed promovenda Esther Molenaar from the University of applied sciences Utrecht. She is a teacher as well for the master degree for physical therapy. What is physical self-reliance? Which factors are important for physical self-reliance? How can you recognise the level of physical self-reliance? And more on this episode of Physio Global.

contributors.headline: Owner Physio Global I Board Member Dutch Association for Manual Therapy I PT I Manual Therapist I ESS I Member Council VvAA

Promovenda lectoraat Innovatie van Beweegzorg I onderzoekt hoe oudere personen zo lang mogelijk hun Fysieke Zelfredzaamheid kunnen behouden I Docent Master (geriatrie) fysiotherapie I Voorzitter expertise groep ouderen

projects.title: Physio Global Podcast the role of the PT during identification of vascular causes with neckpain and headache with scientist Nathan Hutting
projects.description: What is the role of the PT during identification of vascular causes with neckpain and headache? What are the key components to screen accurate on a CAD? Wich factors are important to recognize as a health professional during the screening? In this episode we talk about this subject with Nathan Hutting and about a serious case with a CAD which occured in the Netherlands.

profile_positions.description:
Discuss the form and set up for the NVMT symposium 2020 Young Professionals.
Creating NVMT Webinars in 2020 and 2021 
Getting at the graduation of the Dutch Masters for manual therapists at hogeschool Breederode, Saxion and HAN.
Setting up the annual budget of NVMY Young Professionals 2021-2023.
Getting at the Dutch masters for manual therapy and discuss about the position of the manual therapist and how it will develop in the future. Brainstorming with the board members of the NVMT, the region ambassadors and the Young Professionals about the Dutch definition of manual therapy, position of the manual therapy within the Dutch healthcare system and the future of our profession in 2020-2023.
profile_positions.title: Commission Member of the Dutch Association for Manual Therapy (NVMT) Young Professionals

Knowledge agenda 2023 about Physiotherapy
profile_positions.title: Aspiring Board Member

profile_positions.description: As well as the founder I'm also the company owner. Creating an unique indepent high qualitative online international physio platform to get our profession and the healthcare in general to a higher level for physiotherapists, health professionals and our patients. Lets make a new standard within physiotherapy and beyond.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description:
We are experienced with setting up an online congress within physiotherapy and abroad. Giving advice, support, promote a physiotherapy event within our network, setting up a professional mobile Congress studio for livestreaming and giving the service for watching an event later on. We also can provide by setting up a mobile professional podcast studio as well. Our technical crew is experienced with livestreaming. We have more than 3200 unique livestreamers within our platform and over 5.000 podcast listeners within physiotherapy.

We are experienced in livestreaming an online congress, symposia, podcasts and Webinars. We did this for:

- Dutch Association for Manual Therapy
- Dutch Association for Physiotherapy within Lymphology and Oncology
- Erasmus MC
- Franciscus & Vlietland Hospital
- C-Support, founding for aftercare of long-covid
- Hogeschool Arnhem en Nijmegen (HAN), professorship Work and Health
- Hogeschool Leiden, professorship Self Sustainability and Master Physiotherapy
- Dutch Association for Extended Scope Specialists
- Professional association of carers and nurses
- Patient Federation of the Netherlands
- Hogeschool Zuyd
- Employees' Association Physiotherapy FDV
profile_positions.title: Congress Manager

profile_positions.description: Created a vodcastchannel on YouTube called Physio Global Vodcast to interview different experts from research institutes, universities and from the workfield on location. Talking about different actual subjects related to physiotherapy within the healtcare system. With being the first Dutch national vodcast channel for physiotherapy it's a unique format. With more than 5.000 views there is a good start.
profile_positions.title: Vodcaster

profile_positions.description: Created a podcastchannel called Physio Global Podcast to interview different experts from research institutes, universities and from the workfield. Talking about different actual subjects related to physiotherapy within the healtcare system.
profile_positions.title: Podcaster

profile_positions.description: Building an international online platform for physiotherapy with Physio Global. Discussing interesting, important and actual items within our profession with experts from universities, research institutes and experts from the working field. Talking about different subjects that matters physiotherapy and within the health care system and how we can achieve new goals to get physiotherapy and health care to an higher qualitative level for us as health professionals and our patients.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Part-time job working as a manual therapist in the city of Leiden. Treating patients with complex low back, thoracic, neck, headache, hip and shoulder problems.
profile_positions.title: MSc. Manual Therapist

profile_positions.description: Creator of the Talking Physio Learning About.. series. It's a new formula with an interactive talkshow. Every episode we discuss an interesting item within physical therapy with experts from the field: psychologists, doctors and physical therapists. The online discussion can be watched by livestream or afterwards. With 5 webinars, experts Prof. Dr. Andrea Evers, Prof. Dr. Jeanine Verbunt, Mark Scheper Phd, John Bos MSc, dr. Lennard Voogt, Louis Zantema MSc, dr. Carine den Boer, Prof. Dr. Paul van Wilgen, Edwin de Raaij MSc, Lisanne Tilma MSc its been a great succes Talking about chronic pain and beyond. With more than 100 interviews of different researchers and lecturers it has been an unique platform.
profile_positions.title: Creator Learning About.. and presentator
